author: Natasha Mascarenhas
title: New Jersey launches online portal to give residents accurate answers about COVID-19
description: Fake news about the novel coronavirus disease is a rampant problem across our social timelines. Think misinformation about treatments, symptoms and anecdotes tainted with racism and xenophobia. As scientists and health professionals are still scrambling to fi…
content:
